acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo

Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo ( nonGenerifiedCollection = [OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 31 byteObjectField = 114 shortField = 54 shortObjectField = 21 charField = k charObjectField = i intField = -1199264565 intObjectField = 995696662 longField = 370792256156819 longObjectField = 370792254911533 floatField = 0.44412625 floatObjectField = 0.82676923 doubleField = 0.28089145121411596 doubleObjectField = 0.13916246488845563 stringField = LsFT3va78M objectField = java.lang.Object@1741e4a6 calendarField = Sun Jun 14 14:20:15 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 14 14:20:15 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@6e194937 intArray = [I@1099de65 booleanArray = [Z@391aee9 bigDecimalField = 133569512498 ) should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 15 byteObjectField = 121 shortField = 50 shortObjectField = 5 charField = G charObjectField = d intField = 1451511861 intObjectField = -652710496 longField = 370792258115426 longObjectField = 370792258057418 floatField = 0.038817644 floatObjectField = 0.051837325 doubleField = 0.8766685128628733 doubleObjectField = 0.7426259975294804 stringField = BtsUMI6eB6 objectField = java.lang.Object@1741e4a6 calendarField = Sun Jun 14 14:20:15 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 14 14:20:15 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@1b6d0ee9 intArray = [I@3f19ac42 booleanArray = [Z@612d3732 bigDecimalField = 133569512498 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{otQR1zvVnu=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1434288015554 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@7807e2bb elements
